$interpreted: Angelia: Ugh, disgusting...how come there's so much garbage here?
Angelia: We came to distribute food recently. How come the soldiers never took me here?
Angelia: Now I get it... Everything I've saw, it was just an illusion... conjured up by the nobles.
Angelia: I've never seen the Slums for what they truly are. I never thought the separation between rich and poor was...
Angelia: Ouch!
Angelia: A Soul Energy canister?
Lio: Flutterfly!
Lio: Hey lady, can you gimme my Flutterfly?
Angelia: This? Uh, sure.
Lio: Aww, Flutterfly is broken......
Angelia: This is yours?
Lio: This was where I found Flutterfly. He used to fly high in the sky, but now it looks like he'll die...
Angelia: Maybe I can fix your Flutterfly.
Lio: REALLY?
Lio: Hey lady, you're brilliant, how did you do that?
Angelia: This Soul Energy canister was almost empty. I gave Flutterfly a gemstone filled with Soul Energy.
Angelia: It causes the Soul Energy to undergo sublimation, thereby activating the flying mechanisms within the device. He'll be flying in no time.
Lio: ...Uhhhhhh, what?
Angelia: Might be too complicated for you, little one.
Lio: Mhm. Thank you, lady! I'm Lio, and you are?
Angelia: I'm Angeli...
Angelia: No. Angel... Just call me Angel.
Lio: Hi Angel, do you live in the Slums too?
Angelia: Yes, I...
Hyacinthus: Lio!
Hyacinthus: Why are you here, didn't Nigel forbid you from coming to Garbage Mountain!
Angelia: Why?
Hyacinthus: Because there's...
Hyacinthus: AH! Over there!
Hyacinthus: Is everyone alright? How's Lio?
Angelia: He's doing fine, I've been watching over him.
Hyacinthus: Oh, thank God...
Hyacinthus: Eh? Aren't you the lady that moved into the Slums a fortnight ago?
Angelia: Um, hello. I'm Angel.
Hyacinthus: I'm Hyacinthus, but everyone calls me Cin. Thanks for keeping Lio safe. I'll repay you for your kindness,
Hyacinthus: but let's get out of here first!
Angelia: Mhm. Lio, let's go.
Naya: Angel! Didn't I say to keep a low profile around here?
Angelia: I'm sorry. I wasn't thinking straight...
Naya: Thank goodness that little child didn't know any better. He didn't recognize the royal symbol on your necklace,
Naya: otherwise we'd have nowhere to hide!
Angelia: I'm really sorry. I'll be more cautious in the future.
Naya: Anyways, best to not interact with anyone here...
Hyacinthus: Angel! You there?
Angelia: Ah, Hyacinthus! Is that you?
Hyacinthus: Nigel, this is the lady who took care of Lio today...and this is?
Angelia: She-She's Naya. My sister.
Hyacinthus: Ah, your sister. This is Nigel, caretaker of all of Slum residents.
Hyacinthus: If you have any troubles, he's the man!
Nigel: Thanks for protecting Lio. If something happened to him, I don't know how I'd tell his sister.
Angelia: Sister?
Lio: My sister is really awesome! She's studying at the Rune Academy now!
Angelia: Oh really? I'd love to make her acquaintance!
Naya: It was nice to meet you, but it's getting rather late. We must turn in for the night.
Hyacinthus: We'll take our leave. If you need anything, just let us know. Lio, say goodbye to the guests.
Lio: Bye bye Angel! I'll come over to play tomorrow!
Angelia: Sure, I'll be waiting for you!
Naya: You're still here. Why aren't you leaving?
Nigel: I heard from Lio that you wear an expensive necklace. With such a valuable possession...what's your business in the Slums?
Nigel: Surely you both aren't... nobles?
Angelia: No, it's not like that, we're......
Nigel: True nobles have a strand of hair that shines with the slight touch. Take off your head cloth and let me check.
Naya: So? It's true we used to be nobles, but times have been hard on us. You got a problem with that?
Nigel: Ah, destitute nobles...staying in the Slums, but wearing such a necklace.
Nigel: Is it a memory of past glory?
Nigel: Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.
Nigel: I don't care who you used to be. Once you're here, it's best you leave your past behind. More importantly, don't be a burden to others!
Naya: Angel, look at the trouble you've caused! Don't ever interact with the Slum residents again!
Angelia: But...Nigel swore to secrecy. And it's not like he recognized me as the princess.
Naya: You can't put it that way...
Angelia: Besides, we're part of them now. If we isolate ourselves from everyone, wouldn't that make us even more suspicious?
Angelia: Don't worry, I'll be more careful in the future!
Naya: You just can't stay out of trouble can you...?

Model.Text: Ugh, disgusting...how come there's so much garbage here?
We came to distribute food recently. How come the soldiers never took me here?
Now I get it... Everything I've saw, it was just an illusion... conjured up by the nobles.
I've never seen the Slums for what they truly are. I never thought the separation between rich and poor was...
Ouch!
A Soul Energy canister?
Flutterfly!
Hey lady, can you gimme my Flutterfly?
This? Uh, sure.
Aww, Flutterfly is broken......
This is yours?
This was where I found Flutterfly. He used to fly high in the sky, but now it looks like he'll die...
Maybe I can fix your Flutterfly.
REALLY?
Hey lady, you're brilliant, how did you do that?
This Soul Energy canister was almost empty. I gave Flutterfly a gemstone filled with Soul Energy.
It causes the Soul Energy to undergo sublimation, thereby activating the flying mechanisms within the device. He'll be flying in no time.
...Uhhhhhh, what?
Might be too complicated for you, little one.
Mhm. Thank you, lady! I'm Lio, and you are?
I'm Angeli...
No. Angel... Just call me Angel.
Hi Angel, do you live in the Slums too?
Yes, I...
Lio!
Why are you here, didn't Nigel forbid you from coming to Garbage Mountain!
Why?
Because there's...
AH! Over there!
Is everyone alright? How's Lio?
He's doing fine, I've been watching over him.
Oh, thank God...
Eh? Aren't you the lady that moved into the Slums a fortnight ago?
Um, hello. I'm Angel.
I'm Hyacinthus, but everyone calls me Cin. Thanks for keeping Lio safe. I'll repay you for your kindness,
but let's get out of here first!
Mhm. Lio, let's go.
Angel! Didn't I say to keep a low profile around here?
I'm sorry. I wasn't thinking straight...
Thank goodness that little child didn't know any better. He didn't recognize the royal symbol on your necklace,
otherwise we'd have nowhere to hide!
I'm really sorry. I'll be more cautious in the future.
Anyways, best to not interact with anyone here...
Angel! You there?
Ah, Hyacinthus! Is that you?
Nigel, this is the lady who took care of Lio today...and this is?
She-She's Naya. My sister.
Ah, your sister. This is Nigel, caretaker of all of Slum residents.
If you have any troubles, he's the man!
Thanks for protecting Lio. If something happened to him, I don't know how I'd tell his sister.
Sister?
My sister is really awesome! She's studying at the Rune Academy now!
Oh really? I'd love to make her acquaintance!
It was nice to meet you, but it's getting rather late. We must turn in for the night.
We'll take our leave. If you need anything, just let us know. Lio, say goodbye to the guests.
Bye bye Angel! I'll come over to play tomorrow!
Sure, I'll be waiting for you!
You're still here. Why aren't you leaving?
I heard from Lio that you wear an expensive necklace. With such a valuable possession...what's your business in the Slums?
Surely you both aren't... nobles?
No, it's not like that, we're......
True nobles have a strand of hair that shines with the slight touch. Take off your head cloth and let me check.
So? It's true we used to be nobles, but times have been hard on us. You got a problem with that?
Ah, destitute nobles...staying in the Slums, but wearing such a necklace.
Is it a memory of past glory?
Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.
I don't care who you used to be. Once you're here, it's best you leave your past behind. More importantly, don't be a burden to others!
Angel, look at the trouble you've caused! Don't ever interact with the Slum residents again!
But...Nigel swore to secrecy. And it's not like he recognized me as the princess.
You can't put it that way...
Besides, we're part of them now. If we isolate ourselves from everyone, wouldn't that make us even more suspicious?
Don't worry, I'll be more careful in the future!
You just can't stay out of trouble can you...?

You got a problem with that?","sfxName":"h0018_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0029","IconName":"h0029s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, destitute nobles...staying in the Slums, but wearing such a necklace.","sfxName":"h0029_story_009","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_15_002","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0029","IconName":"h0029s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Is it a memory of past glory?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0029","IconName":"h0029s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.","sfxName":"h0029_story_015","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_16_001","SpeakerName":"Nigel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0029","IconName":"h0029s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't care who you used to be. Once you're here, it's best you leave your past behind. More importantly, don't be a burden to others!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Angel, look at the trouble you've caused! Don't ever interact with the Slum residents again!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But...Nigel swore to secrecy. And it's not like he recognized me as the princess.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You can't put it that way...","sfxName":"h0018_story_009","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_17_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Besides, we're part of them now. If we isolate ourselves from everyone, wouldn't that make us even more suspicious?","sfxName":"h0021_story_028","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_17_004","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't worry, I'll be more careful in the future!","sfxName":"h0021_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_004_003_dialog_english##_17_005","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You just can't stay out of trouble can you...?","sfxName":"h0018_story_028","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
